src_original: kathamiti cet?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathāgatā hi nānātvasaṃjñāvirāhitā iti hetoḥ /
tgt_original: 如來已離種種想故。

src_original: yadi mañjuśrīḥ,  tathāgatāḥ kasmaicinmayānaṃ nirdiśeyuḥ,  kasmaicit pratyekabuddhayānam,
tgt_original: 若有人言： 如來或說大乘之法、或說緣覺乘、或說聲聞乘者。

src_original: kasmaicicca śrāvakayānaṃ nirdiśeyustadā tathāgatasya tāvaccittam apariśuddhamabhiniveśajuṣṭaṃ ca syāt /
tgt_original: 是人於如來所起不清淨心、不平等心、取著之心。

src_original: prādeśikī ca tasya mahākaruṇā syānnānātvasaṃjñā ca /  dharmamuṣṭiścācāryasya syāt /
tgt_original: 《大悲經》云，佛言： 我若說有種種想者，即於法中自生諂曲。

src_original: api ca, mañjuśīḥ,  yebhyaśca sattvebhyo 'haṃ dharmamupadiśāmi te sarve bodhiniyatā mahāyānaparāyaṇāḥ sarvajñatābhinirhatāḥ pakṣaikaniṣṭhāśca bhavanti /
tgt_original: 然我為諸有情所說諸法，皆悉令於菩提樂欲得大乘法一切智攝，使諸有情同到一切智智之地。

src_original: ato nāsmāsu yānavyavastheti /  mañjuśrīḥ, yā hi yānavyavasthābhidhīyate,  tayā sarvajñena bhūmervyavasthā kṛtā,  pudgalānāṃ vyavasthā kṛtā,  alpasattvasamūhasya aprameyasattvasamūhasya ca vyavasthā kṛtā /
tgt_original: 是故無彼諸乘分位而可建立，亦無諸地我所建立，亦不建立補特伽羅事，亦無少行及無量行之所建立，復無三乘而可分別。

src_original: dharmadhātorasambhedād yānabhedo 'pi tāvannāsti /
tgt_original: 彼無分別性入法界門，但為世俗諦故開示引導方便宣說，勝義諦中唯一乘法而無有二。

src_original: tathā hi - “kauśika,
tgt_original: 憍尸迦！

src_original: ye kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitāro vā yadā prajñāpāramitāmupadiśanti tadā prajñāpāramitāvadevopadiśanti /
tgt_original: 善男子善女人宣說般若波羅蜜多時，或有誹謗般若波羅蜜多者。

src_original: yato hi rūpamanityamityupadiśanti,  tathaiva duḥkhatāṃ nirātmatāmaśucitāṃ copadiśanti /  evameva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni dhyānāpramāṇārupānusmṛtisatmyakprahāṇārddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni  tathāgatasya daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇīkā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā ceti  sarvaṃ duḥkhamanātmakaśucītyupadiśanti /
tgt_original: 所謂若說色是無常是苦無我不淨，如是受想行識及界、處、禪定、無量、無色定、念處、正勤、神足、根、力、覺、道、聖諦、無所畏、無礙解、不共佛法，乃至一切相智，是無常是苦無我不淨。

src_original: evameva yadācaranti tadapi prajñāpāramitāyāmevācaranti /  kauśika, tat prajñāpāramitāvadeva kurvanti /
tgt_original: 若如是行，是行般若波羅蜜多。 作此說者，是為誹謗般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: te itthumupadiśantikulaputrāḥ,  atrāgacchatha,
tgt_original: 謂若說言： 善男子！

src_original: prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyaṃ rūpamanityamiti mānupaśyatha,  sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ duḥkhatāṃ nirātmakatāmaśucitāṃ ca mānupapaśyatha /
tgt_original: 汝修般若波羅蜜多時，勿觀色無常，勿觀色苦無我不淨，乃至一切相智亦復如是。

src_original: yatho hi rūpamitisvabhāvataḥ śūnyam,  rūpasya yo 'pi svabhāvaḥ,  sa [sarvathā] asan /
tgt_original: 何以故？ 色自性空故。

src_original: yaccāsat saiva prajñāpāramitā /
tgt_original: 若色自性空，是即般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: tasyāṃ nityamanityamiti nopalabhyate /  yataśca yatrarūpameva nāsti tatra kuto nityamanityaṃ vāāa?
tgt_original: 若般若波羅蜜多中無色為常可得，彼色如是無所有故。 況復若常若無常而可得邪？

src_original: sarvākārajñatāparyatantamitthameva /
tgt_original: 受想行識乃至一切相智亦復如是。

src_original: evaṃ ye hyupadiśanti te prajñāpāramitāvannopadiśanti /
tgt_original: 作此說者是即不謗般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: apitvevamupadeṣṭavyam - kulaputrāḥ,
tgt_original: 又若說言： 善男子！

src_original: atrāgacchatha,  prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatha mā ca kamapi dharmaṃ samatikramatha,
tgt_original: 汝修般若波羅蜜多時，勿謂有法而可過越，勿謂有法而可安住。
